title: The Love of His Life
description: There’s a fine line between love and obsession, and sometimes it kills…..When Maggie’s friend, Nell, convinces her to keep her company at a speed dating event at the local pub, newly single Maggie reluctantly tags along.At the same time, Phil’s mother decides it’s an opportunity for her son to finally meet a girl he can settle down with.As four of the participants collide, their lives change forever, and Maggie no longer knows who she can trust.
author: Molly Garcia
